description: Ranks of certain relations among Euler sums of weight n.
comments: It is conjectured that this is (apart from offset) the same as A216714.
references: M. Waldschmidt, Lectures on Multiple Zeta Values (IMSC 2011), http://www.math.jussieu.fr/~miw/articles/pdf/MZV2011IMSc.pdf
links: P. Flajolet and B. Salvy, Euler sums and contour integral representations, Experimental Mathematics, Vol. 7 Issue 1 (1998)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
